unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Annual Income Interval
question_text: One hundred randomly chosen adult subjects in Jacksonville, FL, were asked their annual income. The data reported from the sample was approximately normal and showed a mean of $\$46{,}203$ with a standard deviation of $\$10{,}201$ . A $95\%$ confidence interval would show, approximately, that we are $95 \% $ confident the average annual income for Jacksonville, Florida residents is between:

choices.text: Assumptions are not met in this situation to compute an appropriate 95 % 95 % confidence interval.
